talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Norfe$
So maybe she'll soon arrive in Rhadames, what with all the refugees pour-...(Suddenly stops talking.)

${user_nick}$
Norfe?

$Hologram Norfe$
…………

$Princess Sylvania$
……………….

$Norfe$
I got a message from the guards. They say Princess Sylvania has in fact arrived in Rhadames.

${user_nick}$
Really?! Then we better go speak with her!
If anyone knows something, it would be Princess Sylvania, right?

$Norfe$
I'll remain here and continue thinking about other ways to get information on the matter,
so can you go and check if Princess Sylvania knows anything about the Cup of Healing Lid,
{user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
Sure, I'll go and report back soon!

$Princess Sylvania$
……………….

$Norfe$
Thank you.

$Princess Sylvania$
Rhadames at last! We'll be safe now! The other citizens have come here too, correct?
That's good… It seems many were saved in spite of the horrible situation.

${user_nick}$
Um… Excuse me. (Is this Princess Sylvania?) You're Princess Sylvania, correct?
I'm here representing Norfe. My name is {user_nick}.
We gained word of your arrival, Princess Sylvania.

$Princess Sylvania$
Oh, a representative of Norfe? …. You look young, but you must be a capable substitute, I suppose? (Her eyes brighten.)
Hmm. The fact that you sought me out must mean you want something in particular, right?

${user_nick}$
Oh, well… There's something I want to ask you……
Do you… happen to know anything about the Cup of Healing?

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_01.ogg}
Cup of Healing? …. I most certainly do. It was a relic of Aergal.
Of course, it exists only in legend now.
It seems you're engaged in nothing but a flight of fancy.

${user_nick}$
But… (Should I tell her?) I'm legitimately interested in the Cup of Healing! I heard there's a separate lid... I came thinking you might happen to know something... I heard it was somewhere in Aergal...

$Princess Sylvania$
Well... I don't know anything about a lid...

$Princess's Maid$
Beggin' your pardon Princess, but they must mean the relic in the-...

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_02.ogg}
(Quickly interrupts the maid.)
Wow, Janet, I just became incredibly hungry all of a sudden. Do you have anything to eat?
And you–what makes you think I would have anything useful to say about an old relic, what with the city being destroyed and all?

${user_nick}$
(I'm pretty sure she just deliberately cut off whatever the maid was going to say.) Well...

$Princess Sylvania$
Well, indeed. Is there anything else you wanted to ask me?

${user_nick}$
No, except… I suppose I am curious about the current status of Aergal…
We heard that the kingdom had fallen…

${user_nick}$
Do you who was responsible?
(Arc says there is a good chance it was Hiver… But you never know.)

$Princess Sylvania$
The most likely culprit behind what happened to Aergal...

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_03.ogg}
I'm not sure, either. I was outside the kingdom when it happened.
I suppose that is why I remain alive.
Based on what I heard from the refugees on the way here, Aergal Kingdom was invaded by Childs.

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_04.ogg}
And it was completely out of the blue. There was no warning... The strange thing is that we had a protective shield in Aergal
that was supposed to keep the Childs from approaching. It is curious that the shield that had always protected Aergal suddenly failed...

$Princess Sylvania$
Then again, given the circumstances in the Western Territory, there's no way a Child has already emerged as a commander……

${user_nick}$
Would there be a connection between the commander and the fall of Aergal?

$Princess Sylvania$
Of course. The whole of the Western Territory is in chaos, after all.

$Princess Sylvania$
It wasn't peaceful when Jade was a commander, but now the entire region is a mess
and Childs have flooded in from all over the place to fight for the empty seat of the commander.

$Princess Sylvania$
The strange thing is that whoever killed the commander didn't claim the post in the first place.

${user_nick}$
(Ugh... Then is this whole situation the result of us killing Jade?)

$Princess Sylvania$
The Childs took advantage of the power vacuum to plunder Aergal Kingdom.
And many of my subjects died or were injured on their way here...

$Princess Sylvania$
I was fortunate that I was outside of the kingdom at the time, but my subjects weren't so lucky...

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_05.ogg}
And now Rhadames is all we have.
You said you're a representative of Norfe, right? Will you tell him what I just said?

$Princess Sylvania$
Aergal Kingdom is nothing but ruins. Our only hope now is Rhadames.

${user_nick}$
Of course! I'll be sure to pass on your message!
(Norfe already announced his intention to accept all the refugees anyway.)

$Norfe$
There you are, {user_nick}. How was the princess? Did she seem to know something about the Cup of Healing?

${user_nick}$
Well… (She cut off her maid from speaking for one thing.) She seemed to know something, but didn't admit as much.
In fact, I'd say she was hiding something. She suddenly changed the subject, for one thing. Yeah, I'd say she knows more than she's letting on.

${user_nick}$
But she just wasn't willing to talk about it…

$Norfe$
Hmm… Is that so? Seems to know something…
What kind of a person does the princess seem like to you, {user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
The way I see it, Princess Sylvania... seemed very concerned about the Aergal Kingdom refugees.
She said Rhadames is their only hope, and that she's glad to have us.

${user_nick}$
She also said Aergal Kingdom is nothing more than a pile of ruins left by the Childs…

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9921_sp_01.ogg}
Thank you for the information. I will have to speak with Princess Sylvania through the hologram.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9921_sp_02.ogg}
Just promise me you won't intervene at any point, {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
Huh? (Does this mean Norfe wants to take care of it himself?) All right.

$Norfe$
Then, present the hologram to Princess Sylvania.

$Princess Sylvania$
What is it now? Have I not satisfied your curiosity?

$Princess's Maid$
Princess… (Fidgeting.)

${user_nick}$
(Just by looking at the maid, it's obvious they are hiding something. Norfe said he would take care of it though.)
This time it's not about the Cup of Healing Lid. Norfe wants to see you.
All you have to do is stand before the hologram.

$Princess Sylvania$
Norfe? Okay then.

$Hologram Norfe$
Greetings, Princess. I am Norfe, the acting leader of Rhadames.
Let me apologize from the outset for having to appear in this form.

$Princess Sylvania$
Well, I can hear you just fine. And it makes sense that the leader of the Anti-Goddess Faction would want to stay hidden.
Though I didn't think that would be necessary with an ally like me.…

$Princess Sylvania$
Still, I'm sure Rhadames has long been the main cog in the Anti-Goddess Faction for a reason. I understand.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9921_sp_01.ogg}
Thank you for your understanding. And... I'm sorry to say this,
but I don't think I can accept any more refugees in Aergal.

$Princess Sylvania$
What??

${user_nick}$
(Huh??)

$Hologram Norfe$
The more refugees there are, the more financially burdensome they will become. As a princess, this is something you surely understand.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9921_sp_02.ogg}
Currently, Rhadames has exceeded the number of refugees
that can be accommodated and is facing a financial crisis.
It is unreasonable to accept additional refugees in this situation.

$Hologram Norfe$
Moreover, Aergal Kingdom was the victim of a Child surprise attack. We have no idea whether they simply wanted the land,
how they knew Aergal's location, or if they suspected its connection with the Anti-Goddess Faction.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9921_sp_03.ogg}
It is too risky to accept refugees from Aergal while ignoring the to potential threat
to Rhadames when the reason for the attack is unknown.

$Princess Sylvania$
Where is this coming from?! I thought Rhadames was a place that welcomed refugees who were left with nowhere to go by the Childs?
How is it that you suddenly can't accept us?
Of course I am aware it will be financially burdensome, but…!

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_06.ogg}
Even so, how is it not an act of outright cruelty to suddenly refuse to accept refugees like this?
They don't even have anything to wear, or food to eat tomorrow! Don't you feel sorry for these people who pinned their hopes on Rhadames?!

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9921_sp_04.ogg}
Money and supplies do not grow from sympathy. That too is something you should know well.

$Princess Sylvania$
Then what if I help ease your financial burden?

$Hologram Norfe$
How? I am well aware that you are not in an enviable position at the moment. With the fall of Aergal Kingdom
you must be quite short on wealth and supplies. Are you not essentially one of the refugees at this point?

$Princess Sylvania$
Well... Yes! But even though Aergal Kingdom has fallen, our technology handed down through the generations still exists.
This is knowledge that is passed down through my people! We can teach some of that knowledge to Rhadames.

$Hologram Norfe$
Like an investment, you mean? Hmm…
When it comes to technology, Rhadames is not surpassed by Aergal Kingdom.
And you know that introducing new technologies always requires money.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9921_sp_05.ogg}
In addition, as I mentioned, there are a lot of concerns regarding those who targeted Aergal.
The refugees of Aergal may pose a threat to Rhadames since we do not know what faction attacked your kingdom, or for what purpose.

${user_nick}$
(Norfe said not to intervene, but… he's going way too far!) I don't understand! This place was originally founded by refugees!
How much different are we from the Childs if we turn a blind eye toward those people who have suffered
by their hand?

${user_nick}$
After they said they came to Rhadames because it was their only hope?
How could you say such a thing to those who have lost their homes and the people they love?

${user_nick}$
When this problem was raised earlier, you said Rhadames was founded from the very beginning
by refugees who gathered after losing their homes to Childs!
So I don't think there will be any problem with the refugees coming from Aergal!

$Princess Sylvania$
Huh? I mean, yeah! That's right! You are a fine speaker–{user_nick} was it?
Leader of Rhadames or not, don't you think you are being too cruel, like {user_nick} said?!

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_07.ogg}
What have my people done to deserve such a rejection? We were attacked because we were weak,
and we came here to survive! It's not a crime to be attacked by the Childs because we were weak.

$Princess Sylvania$
Of course, I fully understand Rhadames's position.
Accepting us without knowing all the risks that entails is in itself a dangerous proposition.

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_08.ogg}But all we need is a place of comfort, nothing else!
If we can't count on that small amount of goodwill, what's the difference between Rhadames
and the Childs who destroyed Aergal?

$Hologram Norfe$
……….

$Hologram Norfe$
All right. If you put it that way, {user_nick}, Princess,
I will give the idea of Rhadames accepting the Aergal refugees an open-minded review.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9921_sp_06.ogg}
However, even so, we cannot accept the risk without anything in return.
Apart from technology, I hope you will find another way to pay
for the risk of accepting the Aergal refugees, Princess.

$Princess Sylvania$
What do you mean, apart from… technology? (Pauses to consider.)
Since we are in a bind financially, I will instead mobilize the manpower we have to help with your own economic activity.
Aergal Kingdom may have collapsed, but it was the people who made it a commercial hub.

$Hologram Norfe$
When it comes to commercial activity, it seems we are in a much better position than you are, Princess.
We already have a unique trade agreement with the Independent State of Merca.

$Princess Sylvania$
The Independent State of Merca... Th-then...….
Are you saying there's something in return you want from Aergal Kingdom, or from me, in particular?
(Pauses to consider.)

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9921_sp_09.ogg}
I know! You guys have been looking for the Cup of Healing Lid, right?
You asked me about it earlier, didn't you?
Why don't I help you look into that relic? There can't be anyone who knows more about Aergal's artifacts than the people of Aergal.

${user_nick}$
(Oh, right, I forgot! Don't tell me... Was that what Norfe was after all along?)

$Hologram Norfe$
The Cup of Healing Lid, you say…? All right. Information on the Cup of Healing Lid and the technology of Aergal Kingdom.
Those together would be enough incentive for Rhadames.

$Hologram Norfe$
If you provide support in these two areas, Rhadames will accept the Aergal refugees
and offer them protection.
When it comes to technological considerations, you should speak with Inventor Narlin.

$Princess Sylvania$
(With apparent relief.) All right. When would be a good time to plan the details?

$Hologram Norfe$
In this regard, I will also send someone to help coordinate with Narlin in the future.

${user_nick}$
(Fortunately, the negotiations seem to have ended well. But why did Norfe say all that? I should go ask him.)

※ Go speak with Norfe.

${user_nick}$
Hey Norfe… I have a question….

${user_nick}$
You definitely told me that Rhadames had no intention of turning away the Aergal refugees, right?
Then why did you say all that to the princess??

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9921_sp_03.ogg}
Though I traveled with you all to find the Cup of Healing, I am the leader of Rhadames first and foremost.
For that reason, I must consider what benefits Rhadames above all. Besides… I had you with me, {user_nick}.

$Norfe$
I knew that no matter what I said about not intervening, you would step forward
when you saw the Aergal Kingdom refugees and the princess being treated unfairly.
After all, you are the kind of person who cannot but take the side of the less fortunate, {user_nick}.

$Norfe$
I did what I did knowing that you would say something, {user_nick}.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9921_sp_04.ogg}
I needed to consider the security of Rhadames and, seeing how much Princess Sylvania seems to care about the people of Aergal,
I also thought this would be the fastest way to get Princess Sylvania to talk.

$Norfe$
However… Getting the princess to talk required using the Aergal refugees and manipulating you, {user_nick}.
Allow me to apologize for that.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9921_sp_05.ogg}
I know that you have a good will, {user_nick}.
However, I had to make use that good will, and for that I am sorry.

${user_nick}$
Oh, not at all! I'm happy to know you have such a high opinion of me… I was just surprised to see you so apparently willing
to coldly abandon the people of Aergal…… But it was all a deliberate negotiation tactic. I'm glad to hear that.
(I should have known. I almost got Norfe completely wrong.)
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

$Princess Sylvania$
……….

journal.title: Unsurmountable Wall
journal.contents:
You asked some refugees about the Cup of Healing, but learned little of substance. Is this where the mission hits a snag? Before coming to any conclusions, tell Norfe what happened.

Rhadames - Norfe

journal.title: Princess of Misfortune
journal.contents:
They say Princess Sylvania has arrived in Rhadames. Speak with her and find out if she knows anything about the Cup of Healing Lid.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania

journal.title: Operations Meeting
journal.contents:
Princess Sylvania seems to know something about the Cup of Healing Lid. But she also appears reluctant to talk about it… Speak with Norfe and discuss how to get her to talk.

Rhadames - Norfe

journal.title: Conciliation
journal.contents:
Norfe asked you to bring Princess Sylvania to the front of the hologram. Talk to Princess Sylvania and bring her.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.destination: Bring Princess Sylvania to the front of the hologram

journal.title: Things that Cannot Be Abandoned
journal.contents:
Princess Sylvania came with you to the front of the hologram. Norfe plans to speak with the princess. Is this finally the time to learn about the Cup of Healing Lid?

Rhadames - Hologram Norfe
journal.destination: Listen to Princess Sylvania and Norfe's conversation.

journal.title: Misunderstanding
journal.contents:
Luckily, negotiations between Princess Sylvania and Norfe ended well. But why did Norfe say what he said to Princess Sylvania? Go to Norfe and ask him about it.

Rhadames - Norfe
journal.todo_msg: Go to Norfe and ask him why he was acting so strangely.
